Kelly Kaufman : Software Developer

Portfolio + Experience

Infinite Loop

X

Infinite Loop

For my capstone, I built an anxiety app that allows users to specify, track, and implement coping skills for their anxiety. I built the app using a Rails backend, a Vue.js frontend, and a PostgresSQL database to store user logs.

Client: Actualize Coding Bootcamp
Category: Fullstack Web App


View App

Student Portal

X

Student Portal

While at Actualize, I lead a team of students to create a student portal. The site enabled students to login, and update their profiles and resumes. This front-end app utilized a Rails API, which was created by another team in my cohort.

Client: Actualize Coding Bootcamp
Category: Front-end Web App

Faux Comm

X

Faux Comm

During my time at Bitwise Industries, a workforce training program, I created a React e-commerce app that allows users to browse, filter, and select clothing pieces.

Client: Bitwise Industries
Category: Front-end Web App

Club Soda

Club Soda

During my time at the Club Soda startup, I contributed to building their store using React, which will allow users to browse and purchase merchandise. Unfortunately, due to the confidentiality of the project I am unable to share it.

Client: Club Soda
Category: Front-end Web App

My Story

I always had an interest in tech but when it came to choosing my path, I thought it was a field only for math geniuses, so I chose hospitality where I gained the skills of collaboration, communication, as well as planning and executing logistical tasks in fast paced environments. However the pandemic hit the industry hard, and I found myself looking for a new career.

Goals

My goals are to impact my passions through tech.
